assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Cogna Educação S.A. operates as a private educational organization in Brazil and internationally. It offers in-class and distance-learning higher education, and undergraduate and graduate courses; editing, marketing, and distribution of teaching books; and educational materials and workbooks. The company also provides basic education, pre-university preparatory courses, and language courses; educational solutions for technical and higher education; and complementary activities, such as education technology development for services to complement management and training. In addition, it offers administration of kindergarten, elementary and high school activities; advises on and/or facilitates direct and indirect student loans; and develops software for adaptive teaching and academic management optimization. Cogna Educação S.A. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.
